data.title: Great happy hour food and drink specials.
data.text: Been going here for years. Food is good at reasonable prices. Service is always good. Great happy hour food and drink specials.

data.title: Good good but waitress disappeared
data.text:
Have been to this location several times over the years.  Was seated quickly, but took a bit while before waitress appeared.  She took our order and delivered our soup and salad - never got the bread that she said was just coming out of the oven.  Never saw her again until she brought the check.  Actually I did see her when I went to beverage station at back of restaurant to get our own drink refills.  The girl that gave me the refills nudged her and isn't that your customer?
Food was good (delivered by a runner) but the bread would have been nice with our soup and salad.
Manager apologized and offered a desert, but we were way past that point.
We will stick to the Buddy's a mile away.  Manager will have to blame slow economy for slow sales - but no wait on Saturday at 6:30 should be a wake up call.

data.title: Great for family gatherings and with children
data.text: We've made Eastside Mario's a regular stop for great-tasting food, super staff and an atmosphere that puts you at ease.  We enjoy the salads, sausage and peppers with pasta, various pasta and chicken dishes - the kids (and adults!) love the thin crust pizzas with a good choice of toppings.  I'm happy that we can get a seat, because it's a neat place to eat.  Choice memory from this past Sunday dinner - my 6-year-old grandson needed to use the restroom (very well kept), so I walked him back, but he paused at the door...it read "Gents"  lol  he didn't know what that meant.  :-)  The private party room is often booked!  Sunday is free child meal with adult.  Mints on your way out  :-)

data.title: family friendly good food
data.text: pleasant atmosphere, good food and service. Family friendly full bar. Convenient parking able to seat large groups.

data.title: Go Here!
data.text: Hadn't been to this place in several years, happy to see that the food and service hasn't declined over time.  Prompt, friendly server, excellent food, comfortable seating - a really good experience in a reasonable price range.  Can't rate it as fine dining but an above average experience at a great value that will really hit the spot.

data.title: Very good Italian eatery
data.text:
For a chain restaurant East Side Mario's is surprisingly good.  The portions are huge (all you can eat soup and salad with your entrée) and the food was very good.  The Italian wedding soup and salad were great.  The Seafood Linguine was delicious, served piping hot and loaded with mussels and shrimp.  The scallops were few and tiny though.  True, I've had better versions of this dish at other restaurants but at a much, much higher price.  So, the value here is outstanding.  My wife had chicken piccata which was quite good.  Kris, our waiter, provided excellent service. 
I highly recommend this place for a decent, affordable Italian meal.  Great for families but it is a bit noisy.

data.title: GREAT BAR AREA
data.text: nice place to have quit lunch or diner with good food and fast service. Very clean the bar area is very favorable if you like play games.

data.title: Love This Place
data.text: Great appetizers and the Bread pudding is awesome...I recently moved to Livonia so I'll visit more often.

data.title: Decent food.
data.text: Nothing really stood out here. The food was ok, but not so good that I can remember what I had. It was crowded and always seems to be. Kind of noisy too. Good place to go with a group.

data.title: Great Food, Great Atmosphere, Great Service
data.text: As I looked around...everyone was having a great time!  Great Food, Great Atmosphere, Great Service!  Enjoy!

data.title: Good place for a couple of drinks or a casual italian meal
data.text: This is a nice restaurant for a casual meal, salad, baked ziti, pizza or the like. The decor is fun, kind of a city vibe complete with a bridge on the wall and other decor. The food is good and medium priced.

data.title: Never Disappoints
data.text: I have never had any problems with Eastside Marios! Great food!!!! I love their bread and salad! They have a great outdoor seating area.

data.title: Good food
data.text: Pretty good food and service.  In the past have not especially liked it, but gave it a try again recently and was surprised that it was much better then several years ago.

data.title: Open floor plan, Family freindly envirement
data.text: Restaurant has a segregated sports type bar with buckets of peanuts and some natural light. New York, Brooklyn themed dining area, also has a larger private dining area available. Good food on par with Olive Garden. All in all a very nice, affordable and popular place.

data.title: Great Food always!
data.text: Never disappoints. Food is always great, prices are good and I have never had a bad experience with the service. I have been so many times I can't even count!

data.title: The Best of The Best.
data.text: Very friendly people, excellent food, and perfect drinks. This restaurant also provides nice and friendly atmosphere.  I strongly suggest this restaurant.

data.title: Better Italian Restaurants in Livonia
data.text: If you are looking for mediocre Italian food in Livonia Eastside Marios is just the place for you.  But if you want really good Italian food then go to Cantoros on Haggerty and Five Mile.  It is well the ride and be sure to make reservations.

data.title: Italian Street atmosphere
data.text: I really enjoyed my experience at Eastside Marios.  The interior has the look and feel of an Italian village.  The service was very attentive and friendly and the food was very good.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Always great italian food for a good price. I have never had bad experience with service and i have gone so many times I couldnt even count.

data.title: You won't leave hungry
data.text: This is a very nice kid friendly restaurant.  The menu ranges from sandwiches to full blown Italian dishes.  Well stocked bar for mixed drinks and beer.  Piedmontese burger is awesome!  When hungry get the chicken parmigiana.  Comes with a ton of salad bread and spaghetti.  Great food and service!  Bar separate from dining area so it doesn't detract from the restaurant feel. Decor inside is like New York City.  You won't be disappointed.
